dialogue: Alice, company policy says that personal items can not be higher than the cubicle wall.
Just out of curiosity, what is the logic behind that bizarre policy?
We want to maintain a smooth line-of-sight for aesthetic reasons.
Let me see if I understand your point of view.
My Einstein doll makes the cubicle so hideous that our stock price will plunge.
Now if I take it down...
Gasp! It's so beautiful now! My soul is filled with music! My life has meaning!
Hey! I just noticed that when I look at this doll and you at the same time, you look hideous.
